/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their green leaves contrasting with the red bricks and providing a sense of tranquility amidst the city's hustle and bustle. A yellow taxi, a common sight in many cities, is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
